issue.title: Hide search title when unecessary
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

When using CATALOG context features, we have the following use case :

- we set a new context
- add some search criteria and hide them
- activate the option "execute a default search"

When going front end, we then have a screen with unecessary infos like :
- title "search" (h1)
- button "search" and "initialize" + "advanced search"
- title "results" (h1)
- text "number of found metadata"

Those infos are not usefull : we juste want a list of result with a specific XSLT applied.

Should be enhanced...

We will bring some idea on this topic later on.
